# BangdiwalaChart

The goal of BangdiwalaChart is to draw a Bangdiwala Chart. Constructed using "The agreement chart" by Shrikant I Bangdiwala. To learn more about Bangdiwala Chart, see
<http://www.stat.ncsu.edu/information/library/mimeo.archive/ISMS_1988_1859.pdf>, and
book: <http://www.utdallas.edu/~pkc022000/agreement_book/> chapter 12: Categorical Data.

## Installation

You can install the released version of BangdiwalaChart from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

  ``` r
install.packages("BangdiwalaChart")
```

## Example

Read the vignette if you want to see a basic example which shows you how to get a bangidwala chart using this function.
